explanation:
code_hardening: Added lazy initialization with a cached field check, ensured dependent components (text field and list) are initialized via their getters, applied padding, fixed preferred size, and disabled focus on the scrollbar to avoid focus issues.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the missing getFontFamilyPanel() method using existing project fields and constants (fontNamePanel, TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT); relied on already-imported Swing/AWT classes without introducing new unresolved references.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced constructor-driven assembly with a lazy getter that builds the font family panel using BorderLayout, adds an accessible label with mnemonic 'F' wired via setLabelFor, embeds a nested panel with the text field on top and a JScrollPane-wrapped list in the center, and forces the vertical scrollbar to always be visible and non-focusable.
refactoring: Extracted font family UI construction into a single reusable lazy method and used clear local variable names (textField, list, innerPanel) to clarify responsibilities.
misc: Ensured left alignment for the label and applied consistent formatting; no new custom API calls were introduced.
